posts.cooked:
Does the following do what you want?

#set par(first-line-indent: (amount: 1.25cm, all: true))
#set heading(numbering: "1.1")
#show heading: pad.with(left: 1.25cm)

= #lorem(5)
== #lorem(5)
#lorem(30)

#lorem(30)

image1130×338 65.8 KB
posts.raw:
Does the following do what you want?

```typ
#set par(first-line-indent: (amount: 1.25cm, all: true))
#set heading(numbering: "1.1")
#show heading: pad.with(left: 1.25cm)

= #lorem(5)
== #lorem(5)
#lorem(30)

#lorem(30)
```

![image|690x206, 75%](upload://myZ2X7qLd7AGX27Ahaat6bHZIBq.png)
